programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteader's wife and her son back to safety after her husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, he stays on to help and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: The Undefeated
programme.desc: A Union colonel (John Wayne) with a herd of cattle crosses paths with an ex-Confederate colonel's (Rock Hudson) gang in Mexico.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger (John Wayne) and a fugitive gambler (Stuart Whitman) stop white renegades running guns and liquor.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: Everybody joins in the search for a little girl who has wandered off.

programme.title: The Adventures of Champion
programme.desc: An evil medicine man holds the tribe's chief captive while plotting a new war against the territory's ranchers.

programme.title: The Adventures of Champion
programme.desc: Ricky and Sandy try to remove prospectors who try to claim a valley after stumbling onto what they think is gold-bearing rock.

programme.title: The Adventures of Champion
programme.desc: Mary Jane, Ricky's young neighbor, is upset when she learns that Uncle Andrew plans to sell the ranch she lives on and force her to move East with him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Champion
programme.desc: Gang members threaten to harm an ex-convict's wife if he doesn't help them rob a bank.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco sets out to capture robbers by joining a gang of outlaws.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Outlaws capture two professors who find the treasure of Montezuma.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two men turn to murder when they want ranch land and copper deposits.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After a man from the East files a gold claim, the claim office burns down.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill is sent into Mexico to investigate and put an end to a counterfeiting ring that's been operating there making phony American currency; the lawman he was to contact is ambushed and killed, leaving Bill to handle the situation alone.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill escorts a prisoner to Pueblo for trial; he is also to deliver money to the prisoner's mother for his daughter, whom she has custody of; the two men encounter a dust storm, which forces them to take refuge in a ghost town.

programme.title: Gun Brothers
programme.desc: A cavalryman (Buster Crabbe) comes home and finds the brother (Neville Brand) he thought was a rancher is actually an outlaw.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill hopes to prove that his friend Steve Murrow is innocent of killing the man who married the girl he was hoping to marry, but he only has 24 hours to do it before Steve is hung; the town sheriff has threatened to kill Bill if he frees Steve.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill Longley arrives in a small Texas town with the intention of helping Les Torbit, an old army buddy, in his range war with Kyle Richards' outfit.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.sub-title: The Man With the Solid Gold Star
programme.desc: Professional gambler Jake Romer wins big in a poker game, taking thousands of dollars in IOUs from Jim Caldwell, an ex-lawman.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Hot-headed Johnny Kaler, embarrassed that he's been caught cheating at cards, provokes Bill Longley into a barroom brawl and is quickly thrashed.

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Members (Danny Glover, Lamont Bentley, Tom Bower) of a black Army corps earn reputations as exceptional soldiers as they help settle the American West.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The new marshal is friends with a known outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Southern belle arrives in North Fork claiming that Micah is her husband.

programme.title: Yancy Derringer
programme.desc: Coco LaSalle convinces Yancy to back her fighter in an illegal boxing match.

programme.title: Yancy Derringer
programme.desc: General Wheeler heads to New Orleans under orders to break up a nation-wide counterfeiting gang.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: The magistrate and the commandant set a trap for Zorro, but Tornado is caught instead.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: Zorro is unmasked while trying to save a young lady from being strangled by the impostor commandant.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: One of the magistrate's agents kidnaps a Gypsy girl to find the source of the gold she is bringing to town.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: Magistrate Galindo devises a scheme to dispose of the new commandant.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: Magistrate Galindo arranges a day of racing to distract the commandant while he steals gunpowder for illegal weapons.

programme.title: Zorro
programme.desc: After finding two prisoners dead, Zorro must protect Capt. Toledano from the Eagle.

programme.title: Catlow
programme.desc: A friendly marshal (Richard Crenna) and a hired gun (Leonard Nimoy) hunt a post-Civil War drifter (Yul Brynner) out to rob $2 million in federal gold.
